cards.title: Sonic Cannon
body: Any number of Ammo cards may be in play next to this card.

At the start of the Environment turn, the Villain with the highest HP deals the Hero Target with the Highest HP 4 Sonic Damage, increased by 3 for each Ammo card next to this card. Then, destroy each Ammo card next to this card.
cards.flavorText: Greyhat tried to shout, voice drowned {br}out by the booms of the cannon. {br}“It's a sonic weapon! How is it firing bullets? {BR}Heck, [i]why[/i] is it firing bullets?”

cards.title: Paintball Mortar
body: Any number of Ammo cards may be in play next to this card.

At the start of the Environment turn, the Villain with the highest HP deals the 2 Hero targets with the Highest HP 3 Toxic Damage each. Each player whose target took damage this way discards 1 card for each Ammo card next to this card. Then, destroy each Ammo card next to this card.
cards.flavorText: Inquirer wiped the green paint from {br}his eyes. “The gun's not that unusual. {br}I'm more interested in how he managed {br}to make a paintball of that size.”

cards.title: The Blood Leech
body: Any number of Ammo cards may be in play next to this card.

At the start of the Environment turn, the Villain with the highest HP deals each Hero Target 1 Infernal Damage. That Villain regains 2 HP, increased by 5 HP for each Ammo Card next to this card. Then, destroy each Ammo card next to this card.
cards.flavorText: “Look, I know we're under attack by a {br}crazed cultist firing off something called {br}'The Blood Leech',” Greyhat muttered, “but I'm {br}just glad it's not literally a giant leech.”

cards.title: T-Shirt Cannon
body: Only 1 Ammo card may be in play next to this card at a time.

During the start of a player's turn, they may discard a card to switch this card with the Hero Equipment version of it and give that player control of it. [i](It has [b]Power[/b]: Discard a card. This hero deals 1 target 3 projectile damage, increased by 1 if you discarded an equipment this way, increased by an additional 1 if you discarded a religalia this way.)[/i]
cards.flavorText: There was a moment's pause as the two {BR}looked at each other. “Okay. I know how {br}those things work, but how the heck did {br}it get the shirts [i]on us[/i]?”

cards.title: T-Shirt Cannon
powers: Discard a card. This hero deals 1 target 3 projectile damage, increased by 1 if you discarded an equipment card this way and increased by an additional 1 if you discarded a religalia card this way.
body: Only 1 Ammo card may be in play next to this card at a time.

flavorQuotes.text: Oh, cool, {br}it even works with shoes!

cards.flavorReference: Tsukiko Tanner, A Day in the Life: Larry

cards.title: Overengineered Slingshot
body: Only 1 Ammo card may be in play next to this card at a time.

During the start of a player's turn, their Hero may deal themselves 3 Fire Damage to switch this card with the Hero Equipment version of it and give that player control of it. [i](It has [b]Power[/b]: Play the top card of your deck. This hero deals 1 target 2 fire damage. Put a card from your hand under the top card of your deck.)[/i]
cards.flavorText: “This is a slingshot that's somehow on fire.” {br}“It fires bullets, so it must be a gun!”, {br}The proprieter's booming voice responded, {br}smile still wide on his face.

cards.title: Overengineered Slingshot
powers: Play the top card of your deck. This hero deals 1 target 2 fire damage. Put a card from your hand under the top card of your deck.
body: Only 1 Ammo card may be in play next to this card at a time.

flavorQuotes.text: It's still on fire. {BR}Doesn't holding it hurt?
Only if I think about it.

cards.flavorReference: A Day in the Life: Larry

cards.title: Glitter Gun
body: Only 1 Ammo card may be in play next to this card at a time.

During the start of a player's turn, their Hero may destroy one of their non-character cards to switch this card with the Hero Equipment version of it and give that player control of it. [i](It has [b]Power[/b]: This hero deals up to 5 targets 1 radiant damage each. Reduce damage dealt by those targets by 1 until the start of your next turn.)[/i]
cards.flavorText: “Don't move, or I'll shoot!” The tension was {br}palpible as all eyes moved to the weapon. {br}“Is that glitter?” “That's right... Move, and {br}you're going to be sparkling for days!”

cards.title: Glitter Gun
powers: This hero deals up to 5 targets 1 radiant damage each. Reduce Damage dealt by those targets by 1 until the start of your next turn.
body: Only 1 Ammo card may be in play next to this card at a time.

flavorQuotes.text: Cleaning up has taken longer since {br}the cleaning gun ran out of ammunition.

cards.flavorReference: Larry, A Day in the Life: Larry

cards.title: Quantum Rounds
body: Play this card next to a Gun card. If there are no Gun cards with room for ammo in play and the Environment Deck is not empty, play the top card of the Environment deck.
Damage dealt by that card's Power is irreducible. After a target is dealt damage by that card's Power, if it has 4 or fewer HP, destroy that Target.
After that Power is used, destroy this card.
cards.flavorText: “This is an empty ammo clip,” She growled, {br}only to receive the man's smile in response. {br}“Or is it?” He quipped, voice as cheerful {br}as it always was when he peddled his wares.

cards.title: Concussive Rounds
body: Play this card next to a Gun card. If there are no Gun cards with room for ammo in play and the Environment Deck is not empty, play the top card of the Environment deck.
After a target is dealt damage by that card's power, that target deals itself 2 Irreducible Sonic Damage.
After that Power is used, destroy this card.
cards.flavorText: “Is this supposed to vibrate a lot, {br}or give someone a concussion?” {br}Larry thought for a moment, before he {br}responded with a nod and a firm, “Yes.”

cards.title: Locked and Loaded
body: When this card enters play, put the Environment Deck in the Environment Trash.
Then, play the topmost Gun Card in the Environment Trash.
Then, play the topmost Ammo card in the Environment Trash.
Then, shuffle the Environment Trash into the Environment Deck and destroy this card.
cards.flavorText: “Isn't it against some sort of law to keep {br}guns loaded all the time?” The man sighed. {br}“Some of these guns are against the laws of {br}physics, but that hasn't stopped Larry either.”

cards.title: Larry
body: At the end of the Environment turn, play the top card of the Environment deck.
At the start of the Environment turn, this card regains HP equal to the number of Gun cards in play and deals each other non-Device target 1 Psychic Damage.
When this card is destroyed, if it has 1 or more HP, first play the top card of the villain deck.
cards.flavorText: The man gazed over them with a lazy eye. {br}“Welcome to Larry's Gun Club! Sign up now {br}for our gun-of-the-month program!”, {br}He shouted, as the crew glared back in irritation.

cards.title: Standoff
body: When this card enters play, reveal cards from the Environment deck until a Gun card is revealed, play it, and shuffle the other revealed cards into the Environment Deck.
The Villain with the highest HP and Hero with the highest HP cannot deal damage to each other.
At the start of the Environment turn, search the Environment deck and trash for Larry, put it into play, shuffle the Environment deck, and destroy this card.
cards.flavorText: The two figures stared at each other from {br}opposite ends of the hallway, weapons drawn {br}and at the ready. Neither made a move, until {br}interrupted by a familiar, “Welcome!”

protoCards.title: Twitchy Triggers
body: When this card enters in play, if there are no Gun cards in play, reveal cards from the Environment deck until a Gun card is revealed, play it, and shuffle the other revealed cards into the Environment Deck.
Otherwise, use the power on each Gun card with a power, and trigger the End of Turn effect on each Gun card with an end of turn effect.
protoCards.flavorText: The two figures stared at each {br}other from opposite ends of the {br}hallway, weapons drawn and at the {br}ready. Neither of them made a move.
